oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Shady Acres Ranch radio show (WASK) - 1950-07-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Curly Myers and the Shady Acres Ranch Gang radio show. Originally broadcast 1950-07-09 at 4:30 pm to 5:00 pm on WASK, Lafayette, Indiana. The weekly radio show was broadcast on Saturdays at 4:30 pm from 'The Bunkhouse', Shady Acres Ranch, east of Mulberry, Indiana. Mentioned personnel include Gerald 'Curley' Myers (MC, vocals), Country Cousin Chickie (MC), Keith 'Big Foot' Kallner (vocals), Bob 'Copie' Coapstick (vocals), Doris Bailey (vocals), and Bob Harshman (accordion). Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/275
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Shady Acres Ranch Gang
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: We'll Rest At The End Of The Trail (Curley Myers, Keith Kallner, Bob Coapstick vocals) -- Mama, What'll I Do (Doris Bailey vocals) -- Comedy routine (Country Cousin Chickie) -- Pennsylvania Polka (Bob Harshman accordion) -- I'll Fly Away (Shady Acres Quartet) -- Closing statement (Country Cousin Chickie) -- Theme (Bunkhouse Jamboree)
